meanings.definition: Relating to or involving different ethnic groups.
meanings.sent1: The interethnic festival celebrated various cultures.
meanings.sent2: The interethnic neighborhood was a melting pot of traditions.
meanings.sent3: The interethnic potluck showcased a blend of flavors from around the world.
meanings.sent4: The interethnic harmony in the community was like a beautiful mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The interethnic dance performance was a vibrant display of diversity.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring between different ethnic groups.
meanings.sent1: The interethnic conflicts were resolved through dialogue.
meanings.sent2: The interethnic marriage symbolized unity amidst diversity.
meanings.sent3: The interethnic soccer match brought together players from diverse backgrounds.
meanings.sent4: The interethnic bridge connected two culturally distinct neighborhoods.
meanings.sent5: The interethnic exchange program fostered understanding among students.
